mapper.sql: id,author_id as authorId,title,thumbnail,comments, is_comment as isComment, status,summary,views,weight,category_id as categoryId,create_time as createTime,update_time as updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT ac.`id`, ac.`author_id`, ac.`title`, ac.`thumbnail`, ac.`comments`, ac.`is_comment`, ac.`status`, ac.`summary`, ac.`views`, ac.`weight`, ac.`category_id`, category.name as categoryName, ac.`create_time`, ac.`update_time` FROM muxui_article as ac LEFT JOIN muxui_category as category ON category.id=ac.category_id WHERE ac.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE muxui_article SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE muxui_article SET comments = comments + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(comments) commentsTotal, SUM(views) viewsTotal FROM muxui_article article
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, "%Y-%m-01 00:00:00" ) archiveDate, COUNT(*) articleTotal FROM muxui_article GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( create_time, "%Y-%m-01 00:00:00" ) ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT FROM muxui_article WHERE DATE_FORMAT( create_time,"%Y-%m-01 00:00:00")= DATE_FORMAT(#{archiveDate}, "%Y-%m-01 00:00:00" )
